title: Blox Fruits: How to Get and Use Light Fruit (Guide)

steps.title: Light Fruit is a Rare Elemental type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: Light Fruit is a Rare Elemental type Blox Fruit. It can be purchased from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $650,000 or 1,100 Robux.

steps.title: Light Fruit is one of the best grinding fruits.
steps.content: Light Fruit is one of the best grinding fruits. This is especially true for the First Sea, since it has a lot of AoE moves, does a good amount of damage, and has low mastery requirements. [1] X Research source Once you get to the Third Sea, it's best to shift to Awakened Buddha . However, Light Fruit is a great option for the First Sea and earlier parts of the Second Sea.

steps.title: Light Fruit costs 14,500 Fragments to fully awaken.
steps.content: Light Fruit costs 14,500 Fragments to fully awaken. Fragments can be obtained in several ways, but you'll most likely get them from finishing raids or defeating Sea Beasts. The order in which to awaken your moves is as follows: Z: 500 Fragments (Also changes the M1 attacks from a spear to a sword) F: 2,000 Fragments X: 3,000 Fragments C: 4,000 Fragments V: 5,000 Fragments After awakening Light Fruit, you'll get the title The First Light (#034).

steps.title: Light Ray (Z)
steps.content: Light Ray ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 2686 Cooldown: 7.5 seconds Description: You shoot a beam of light from your leg in the direction of the cursor. This beam will knock enemies back.

steps.title: Barrage of Light (X)
steps.content: Barrage of Light ( X ) Mastery cost: 40 Mastery Damage: 865-4956 Cooldown: 10.5 seconds Description: You teleport upwards, then shoot a barrage of light beams towards the cursor. These beams explode upon impact. The longer you hold this attack, the more beams will be shot.

steps.title: Reflection Kick (C)
steps.content: Reflection Kick ( C ) Mastery cost: 80 Mastery Damage: 3581 Cooldown: 13.5 seconds Description: You create some mirrors with a beam of light bouncing between them. This move teleports you to the cursor, after which you shoot a large beam of light and cause an AoE explosion.

steps.title: Sky Beam Barrage (V)
steps.content: Sky Beam Barrage ( V ) Mastery cost: 110 Mastery Damage: 5013 Cooldown: 24 seconds Description: You create a light explosion from your hand. This will cause light beams to shoot from the sky around you. These beams will explode upon impact, damaging and stunning enemies.

steps.title: Light Flight (F)
steps.content: Light Flight ( F ) Mastery cost: 10 Mastery Damage: n/a Cooldown: 5.5 seconds Description: You transform into a ball of light and start to fly in the direction you were facing. You cannot turn, but you can change direction if you hit something.

steps.title: Divine Arrow (Z)
steps.content: Divine Arrow ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 500 Fragments Damage: 3133-5222 Cooldown: 7.5 seconds Description: You create a bow and arrow out of light. When attacking, you can hold the attack to shoot up to three arrows. The longer you hold, the more damage this attack does. If the arrows hit the target, they will stun them.

steps.title: Hand of the Emperor (X)
steps.content: Hand of the Emperor ( X ) Mastery cost: 40 Mastery Fragments cost: 3,000 Fragments Damage: 5729 Cooldown: 10.5 seconds Description: You shoot a beam of bright light from your hand. You can move this beam of light around, and if it hits an enemy it will stun them and do a lot of damage.

steps.title: Lightspeed Destroyer (C)
steps.content: Lightspeed Destroyer ( C ) Mastery cost: 80 Mastery Fragments cost: 4,000 Fragments Damage: 3939 Cooldown: 13.5 seconds Description: You transform into a ball of light and dash forward. If you hit an enemy, you will kick them around erratically before smashing them into the ground.

steps.title: Wrath of God (V)
steps.content: Wrath of God ( V ) Mastery cost: 110 Mastery Fragments cost: 5,000 Fragments Damage: 5729 Cooldown: 24 seconds Description: You summon a barrage of light beams that shoot down from the sky. These beams explode on impact and stun while breaking instinct.

steps.title: Shining Flight (F)
steps.content: Shining Flight ( F ) Mastery cost: 10 Mastery Fragments cost: 2,000 Fragments Damage: n/a Cooldown: 5.5 seconds Description: Similar to the unawakened move, but you can now change direction and you fly a bit faster.

steps.title: Elemental Reflex
steps.content: Elemental Reflex You are immune to all attacks by Fighting Styles, Swords, and Guns, unless the attacks are imbued with Aura or the enemy is a higher level than you.

steps.title: Light Spear
steps.content: Light Spear When clicking (or tapping on mobile), you will slash forward with a trident made of light.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Very mobile Does a lot of damage Great for new players due to low mastery requirements Awakened version works great with combos Many moves can stun

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Elemental Reflex isn't as useful in the Third Sea Not all moves break instinct Can be hard to aim when airborne Lower damage than other awakened Fruit Awakened F is hard to steer
